snippet: KETTANEH--Mary. The Trustees, Fellows, and staff of the Morgan Library & Museum note with sadness the death of Mary Kettaneh, a longstanding and generous benefactor. We extend our sincere condolences to her family. Colin B. Bailey, Director Lawrence R. Ricciardi, Pres. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KETTANEH--Mary. The Trustees, Fellows, and staff of the Morgan Library & Museum note with sadness the death of Mary Kettaneh, a longstanding and generous benefactor. We extend our sincere condolences to her family. Colin B. Bailey, Director Lawrence R. Ricciardi, Pres. 1/3
